root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 17-19-2, translated into en
root.data: Goal 17. Strengthen the means of implementing and revitalizing the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development17.19 By 2030, build on existing initiatives to establish indicators of progress in sustainable development that would complement gross domestic product, and support statistical capacity building in developing countries17.19.2 Proportion of countries that a) have conducted at least one population and housing census in the past 10 years, and b) have achieved a birth registration rate of 100% and a birth registration rate 80% deaths17.19.2 a) Year of last RGPHISTEEBUNDAYISENGA ModestSocial studies and statistics and poverty monitoring (ESSSP)ESSSP department manager794019391158 BUJUMBURAndayimode2010@gmail.comYear of last RGPHISTEEBUGeneral census of the populationISTEEBU is responsible for compiling this indicator at the national levelUpdating the indicator requires a household survey which is very resource intensive. The indicator cannot be calculated by gender.Available nationallyThe indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international level
